description:
我手动部署openstack环境m版本，在dashboard上创建实例时，提示无法创建服务器，然后我glance image-list，提示错误
500 Internal Server Error: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)

然后，我[root@controller wy]# mysql -hlocalhost -unova -pNOVA_DBPASS 报错 ERROR 1040 (08004): Too many connections
使用任何用户登录时，都会提示这个连接数过多，但是我使用root可以登录数据库，查询连接数只有215，我设置的最大连接数是4096.。
使用dashboard时，就会提示 无法获取可用域，无法获取镜像，无法获取。。。感觉是数据库的原因。。。求大神
title: 500 Internal Server Error

comments.content:
我手动部署openstack环境m版本，在dashboard上创建实例时，提示无法创建服务器，然后我glance image-list，提示错误
500 Internal Server Error: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)

然后，我[root@controller wy]# mysql -hlocalhost -unova -pNOVA_DBPASS 报错 ERROR 1040 (08004): Too many connections
使用任何用户登录时，都会提示这个连接数过多，但是我使用root可以登录数据库，查询连接数只有215，我设置的最大连接数是4096.。
使用dashboard时，就会提示 无法获取可用域，无法获取镜像，无法获取。。。感觉是数据库的原因。。。求大神
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wy123

comments.content: You're going to have to provide more details what you were doing, what type of deployment this is, what logs you have with an error, etc. Too many connections looks like a deployment-specific error, not a problem with nova unless you explain otherwise.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
I hava foung the problem and solve it in some way.However,there are still some questions.
I went into mysql and set the max connections = 4096,as a result ,it works.What I wang to ask is why the my.inf does not 
works.I deploy the OpenStack M according to the the documentation on the official website.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wy123
